meta-review.comment: Cowabunga! Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Arcade Wrath Of The is a tubular, action-packed brawler that's as satisfying as a slice of New York pizza. From gnarly combos to shell-shocking boss battles, this game is a shell of a good time. It's a blast from the past that's sure to ninja kick your nostalgia into overdrive. So grab your nunchucks and get ready for a radical ride through the sewers of 90s gaming!
